title: ChatZilla
projectDesc: A chat web application powered by Socket.IO, designed to provide real-time messaging capabilities for users. Provides functionality to join and text in multiple rooms simultaneously, with chats being stored in a NoSQL DB and access only to authenticated users

title: MS Tube
projectDesc: A user-friendly video sharing platform with a user interface similar to that of YouTube built from scratch, facilitating effortless sign-in and video uploads for multiple users. All the relevant information like channel details, subscriber data, video likes/dislikes, is securely stored on MongoDB Cloud. Provides search functionality and utilizes JSON Web Tokens(JWT) for secure user authentication

title: Quiziosity
projectDesc: A fully functional React based quiz web app where users have the ability to add/delete questions and test themselves with their knowledge of React.js. Redux is used to store user input, enabling the calculation of the final result based on their responses

title: Prescriptify
projectDesc: A React-based web app using OpenAIâ€™s API to generate medical prescriptions from user input, populating a template with JSON. Streamlines prescription creation for healthcare professionals
